experience.title: Director
experience.description: A well established international real estate company with extensive experience and vast database in the field. The company aims to provide the best consultations to the client and maintain the trust and satisfaction of every single client. The company has its major focus on Residential and commercial which includes both Investment, Leasing and resale Equipped with best in class employees, management  professionals having related expertise of their field in real estate sector.

experience.title: Real Estate Specialist
experience.description: HiLITE Builders is a premium builders & developers based in Calicut delivering a world-class living experience in tune with nature. We offer a wide range of choices to fit every lifestyle and our projects breathe perfection. Trust and goodwill are the strong pillars that support our edifices. This makes us the top builders in the city. Our elegant and intelligent designs speak for themselves, offering a seamless word of unparalleled luxury.

experience.title: Shipping Executive
experience.location: Business Bay, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
experience.description: PARIS GROUP is recognized for 37 years of continuous success, as one of the principal forces in the Fashion and Hospitality business in the Middle East and Far East Region; it demonstrated an appreciation for the retail industry by taking a leadership role as an agent, distributor and franchisee.The Company merits its position by representing a management profile of over 250 owned boutiques. Today, a team of more than 4,000 highly skilled and dedicated multinational professionals from around 32 nationalities are an extension of Paris Group; with direct employees of over 3,301 in United Arab Emirates & the GCC Region.PARIS GROUP is committed in bringing the class of fashion clothing to the GCC Region with the encompassing franchise partnership with world top fashion designers such as below listed renewed brands to just name a few:BALMAINGIANFRANCO FERRELOUIS FERAUDPIERRE CARDINALESSANDRO DELL'AQUAWholesale/Logistics:Apart from our retail chain, we have wholesale division and 800,000 sq ft. fully automated warehouse, logistic system as well as owned by the group 100%, one of the biggest retail Fashion logistics center in UAE.Other businesses of the group:a. F&B: AL HALABI ; FERRE CAFE restaurant in Dubai.b. Real Estate Division: Sankari Investments in UAE & France. Apart from the business setup, the group invested in properties.
